Package it.polimi.ingsw.Game

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Game.Turn
public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Turn()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addResource​(LeaderWarehouse where, int pos)
    This method let player to add a resource, witch he took from the market, to the WarehouseDepots or into an ExtraStorageLeaderCard or even to discard it letting other players to advance in them faith track
    void changeWhiteMarbleWith​(int pos)
    This method is to be called when the player is going to add a white marble: this marble is changed with another marble using a WhiteMarbleLeaderCard
    void chooseDiscardLeaderCard()
    This method lets the player to go in the next step of discarding a leader card by controlling in which steps he is currently in and before.
    void choosePlayLeaderCard()
    This method lets the player to go in the next step of choosing a leader card to play by controlling in which steps he is currently in and before.
    void discardLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method lets the player to discard one leader card from his hand.Also keeping track of hic actions, by controlling if he has done the action leader before or after a normal move.
    void drawSoloActionToken()  
    void endGame()  
    boolean getViewFinalPoints()  
    void moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method let player to move a resource from the warehouseDepots to an ExtraStorageLeaderCard the first position of the start slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
    void moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots​(int pos2)
    This method let player to move up to two resources in the WarehouseDepots the first position was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
    void moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method let player to move a resource from an ExtraStorageLeaderCard to the selected slot of the warehouseDepots the arrive position of the slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
    void obtainDevelopmentCard​(int pos)
    This method lets you to take a Development card First choose the development card and than pay for it.
    void obtainGenericResource​(Resource resource)
    This method lets you to choose a specific power production at your choice
    void payWithExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method lets you pay with a Leader Card positioned in your table, by checking firstly if you any resources, secondly if the position player chose really exists, thirdly if card chosen is really a leader card, and the last if the cards are the same type.
    void payWithStrongBox​(Resource pay)
    This method let to pay a resource from the list payingResources using the StrongBox, but befor checking if you are in the right states
    void payWithWarehouseDepots​(int pos)
    This method lets you pay a resource with a resource located in the warehousedepots.
    void playLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method let the player to put on the table a leader card that was in his hand in case the player select a StorageLeaderCard, the list payingResources is updated with the resources the player has to pay If the game is played by one person he will have the ability to choose an action token.
    void selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot​(int pos)
    This method let player to select a slot of the WarehouseDepots useful for moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots, moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard and moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard the selected slot is saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
    void selectDefaultProductionPower()
    This method let you select or deselect the default production power and by checking the turns of the player if he is allowed to do this method or not
    void selectNormalAction​(NormalAction selectedNormalAction)
    This method let the player to select a normal action which are take resource from the market, buy development card and controlling if he can really afford to buy one, activate production by controlling if he can can activate a power production
    void selectProductionDevelopmentCard​(int pos)
    This method let you select or deselect a production power from a DevelopmentCard and by checking the turns of the player if he is allwed to do this method or not
    void selectProductionPowerLeaderCard​(int pos)
    This method let you select or deselect a production power from a ProductionPowerLeaderCard and by checking the turns of the player if he is allwed to do this method or not
    void startPayment()
    This method let you start the payment of the selected production power
    void takeResourcesFromTheMarket​(RowColumn rowColumn, int pos)
    This method let player to take resources from the market Taken resources are added to the list marblesFromTheMarket Faith marble are removed advancing on the faith track White marble could be removed, substituted or could remain

  • Constructor Details

    • Turn

      public Turn()

  • Method Details

    • chooseDiscardLeaderCard

      public void chooseDiscardLeaderCard() throws NoLeaderCardToDiscardException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method lets the player to go in the next step of discarding a leader card by controlling in which steps he is currently in and before. Taking in consideration that one leader move can be done only one time before or after a normal action.
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if other steps are different from CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT1 and CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT2 and if a leader action is done before can cannot do it for a second time
      NoLeaderCardToDiscardException

    • choosePlayLeaderCard

      public void choosePlayLeaderCard() throws ActionNotAllowedException, NoLeaderCardToPlayException
      This method lets the player to go in the next step of choosing a leader card to play by controlling in which steps he is currently in and before. Taking in consideration that one leader move can be done only one time before or after a normal action.
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if other steps are different from CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT1 and CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT2 and if a leader action is done before cannot do it for a second time
      NoLeaderCardToPlayException

    • discardLeaderCard

      public void discardLeaderCard​(int pos) throws YetDiscardedThisLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method lets the player to discard one leader card from his hand.Also keeping track of hic actions, by controlling if he has done the action leader before or after a normal move. If the game is played by one person he will have the ability to choose an action token.
      Parameters:
      pos - : number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the leader card in hand to discard
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if other steps are different from CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT1 and CHOSE_ACTION_LEADER_OR_NOT2
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      YetDiscardedThisLeaderCardException

    • playLeaderCard

      public void playLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NotSatisfiedRequirementsForThisLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method let the player to put on the table a leader card that was in his hand in case the player select a StorageLeaderCard, the list payingResources is updated with the resources the player has to pay If the game is played by one person he will have the ability to choose an action token.
      Parameters:
      pos - : number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the leader card in hand to play
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if other steps are different from PLAY_LEADER_CARD1 AND PLAY_LEADER_CARD2
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotSatisfiedRequirementsForThisLeaderCardException

    • selectNormalAction

      public void selectNormalAction​(NormalAction selectedNormalAction) throws ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let the player to select a normal action which are take resource from the market, buy development card and controlling if he can really afford to buy one, activate production by controlling if he can can activate a power production
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if other steps are different from SELECT_NORMAL_ACTION, AND BY CONTROLLING THE POSSIBILITIES IF THE PLAYER CAN AFFORD A MOVE

    • takeResourcesFromTheMarket

      public void takeResourcesFromTheMarket​(RowColumn rowColumn, int pos) throws ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to take resources from the market Taken resources are added to the list marblesFromTheMarket Faith marble are removed advancing on the faith track White marble could be removed, substituted or could remain
      Parameters:
      rowColumn - : to choose a row or a column of the market
      pos - : to choose the position of the row or of the column
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if action is different from TAKE_RESOURCES_FROM_THE_MARKET

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(LeaderWarehouse where, int pos) throws NoResourceToAddException, DifferentStorageException, OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException, UnexpectedFaithMarbleException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let player to add a resource, witch he took from the market, to the WarehouseDepots or into an ExtraStorageLeaderCard or even to discard it letting other players to advance in them faith track
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the WarehouseDepots or of the LeaderCard in hand; it's unuseful in case of discarding the resource
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if action is different from TAKE_RESOURCES_FROM_THE_MARKET
      NoResourceToAddException
      DifferentStorageException
      OccupiedSlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException
      DifferentResourceInThisShelfException
      UnexpectedWhiteMarbleException
      UnexpectedFaithMarbleException

    • changeWhiteMarbleWith

      public void changeWhiteMarbleWith​(int pos) throws java.lang.ClassCastException, NoWhiteMarbleException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method is to be called when the player is going to add a white marble: this marble is changed with another marble using a WhiteMarbleLeaderCard
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the WhiteMarbleLeaderCard on the table
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if action is different from TAKE_RESOURCES_FROM_THE_MARKET
      java.lang.ClassCastException
      NoWhiteMarbleException

    • obtainDevelopmentCard

      public void obtainDevelopmentCard​(int pos) throws NoDevelopmentCardToObtainException, PositionInvalidException, GameEndedException
      This method lets you to take a Development card First choose the development card and than pay for it.
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the DevelopmentCard on slotdevelopmentcard
      Throws:
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NoDevelopmentCardToObtainException
      PositionInvalidException

    • payWithStrongBox

      public void payWithStrongBox​(Resource pay) throws WrongPaymentException, NotEnoughResourcesException, NegativeResourceException, NotAResourceForStrongBoxException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method let to pay a resource from the list payingResources using the StrongBox, but befor checking if you are in the right states
      Parameters:
      pay - : to choose the type of resource from the Strongbox you are using to pay
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      WrongPaymentException
      NotEnoughResourcesException
      NegativeResourceException
      NotAResourceForStrongBoxException
      NoResourceToPayException

    • payWithWarehouseDepots

      public void payWithWarehouseDepots​(int pos) throws WrongPaymentException, YetEmptySlotException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method lets you pay a resource with a resource located in the warehousedepots. When action is chosen it cheks if resource are of the same type or not.It checks if the player is in the right turn to pay with the resources in the ware house depots.
      Parameters:
      pos - :Location of the resource to pay from werehousedepots
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if you are in the other states
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      WrongPaymentException
      YetEmptySlotException
      NoResourceToPayException

    • payWithExtraStorageLeaderCard

      public void payWithExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException, WrongPaymentException, EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException, NoResourceToPayException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method lets you pay with a Leader Card positioned in your table, by checking firstly if you any resources, secondly if the position player chose really exists, thirdly if card chosen is really a leader card, and the last if the cards are the same type. Always controlling first if the player is in the right turn to do che paying process.
      Parameters:
      pos - : position from 1 to 2 to chose on your table
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if the player is in different turn than he should be.
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      WrongPaymentException
      EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      NoResourceToPayException

    • selectProductionDevelopmentCard

      public void selectProductionDevelopmentCard​(int pos) throws ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let you select or deselect a production power from a DevelopmentCard and by checking the turns of the player if he is allwed to do this method or not
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the DevelopmentCard
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if the player is in different turn than he should be.

    • selectProductionPowerLeaderCard

      public void selectProductionPowerLeaderCard​(int pos) throws NoProductionLeaderCardException, ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let you select or deselect a production power from a ProductionPowerLeaderCard and by checking the turns of the player if he is allwed to do this method or not
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the ProductionPowerLeaderCard
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if the player is in different turn than he should be.
      NoProductionLeaderCardException

    • selectDefaultProductionPower

      public void selectDefaultProductionPower() throws ActionNotAllowedException
      This method let you select or deselect the default production power and by checking the turns of the player if he is allowed to do this method or not
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if the player is in different turn than he should be.

    • obtainGenericResource

      public void obtainGenericResource​(Resource resource) throws NoGenericResourceToObtainException, NotAResourceForStrongBoxException, GameEndedException
      This method lets you to choose a specific power production at your choice
      Parameters:
      resource - it takes a resource ball with a generic power
      Throws:
      NoGenericResourceToObtainException - there ane not any generic resource to obtain
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotAResourceForStrongBoxException

    • startPayment

      public void startPayment() throws NotEnoughResourcesException, YouHaveNotSelectedAnyProductionException, ActionNotAllowedException, GameEndedException
      This method let you start the payment of the selected production power
      Throws:
      ActionNotAllowedException - if the player is in different turn than he should be.
      GameEndedException - if the game is finished and it's time to show final points
      NotEnoughResourcesException
      YouHaveNotSelectedAnyProductionException

      Throws:

    • selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot

      public void selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot​(int pos) throws PositionInvalidException
      This method let player to select a slot of the WarehouseDepots useful for moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots, moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard and moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard the selected slot is saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the position of the slot of the WarehouseDepots
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException

    • moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots

      public void moveResourcesInWarehouseDepots​(int pos2) throws NotAdmittedMovementException
      This method let player to move up to two resources in the WarehouseDepots the first position was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos2 - : to choose the second position of the slot of the WarehouseDepots
      Throws:
      NotAdmittedMovementException

    • moveResourcesFromWarehouseDepotsToExtraStorageLeaderCard

      This method let player to move a resource from the warehouseDepots to an ExtraStorageLeaderCard the first position of the start slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard as destination
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException

      DifferentStorageException

    • moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard

      public void moveResourcesToWarehouseDepotsFromExtraStorageLeaderCard​(int pos) throws PositionInvalidException, NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException, PositionAlreadyOccupiedException, ResourceAlreadyPlacedException, DifferentResourceInThisShelfException, EmptySlotExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      This method let player to move a resource from an ExtraStorageLeaderCard to the selected slot of the warehouseDepots the arrive position of the slot of the warehouseDepots was selected using selectAWarehouseDepotsSlot and saved in var selectedWarehouseDepotsSlot of type int
      Parameters:
      pos - : to choose the number 1 or 2 to determinate the position of the ExtraStorageLeaderCard as start
      Throws:
      PositionInvalidException
      NotAnExtraStorageLeaderCardException
      PositionAlreadyOccupiedException
      ResourceAlreadyPlacedException
